00052         
00062 inline double Ellipse::ProbDensity( double x, double y ) {
00063      if ( Disc <= 0.0 ) {
00064           return 0.0;
00065      }
00066      x -= mx;
00067      y -= my;
00068      return InvSqrtDisc * exp( -0.5 * ( Vy*x*x - 2.0*Cxy*x*y + Vx*y*y ) / Disc );
00069 }
